body_html: Contributions welcome! As a first cut I think the above will work (albeit might not be the most efficient), and we need to use TensorFlow's file_io instead of the raw with open(...) as ... -- this is to support many platform and file systems.
body_text: Contributions welcome!  As a first cut I think the above will work (albeit might not be the most efficient), and we need to use TensorFlow's file_io instead of the raw with open(...) as ... -- this is to support many platform and file systems.
body: Contributions welcome!  As a first cut I think the above will work (albeit might not be the most efficient), and we need to use TensorFlow's `file_io` instead of the raw `with open(...) as ...` -- this is to support many platform and file systems.
